_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeaderOS
author: contact@leaderos.net
description: Host LeaderOS software on Pterodactyl Panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

apk --update add git unzip

git clone https://github.com/leaderos-net/leaderos-pterodactyl-egg ./temp

cp -r ./temp/nginx /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/logs /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
rm -rf ./temp

echo -e "Downloading LeaderOS..."
cd /mnt/server/webroot
wget https://installer.leaderos.net/latest.zip
unzip latest.zip
rm -rf latest.zip
echo -e "Download complete!"
echo -e "Go to http://ip:port/install"
exit 0
